description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4j1d9","text":"This protocol describes the isolation of RNA from SH-SY5Y cells and the subsequent conversion to cDNA for qPCR. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"88d7d","text":"NucleoSpin RNA plus kit: 740984.50, Macherey-Nagel","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3l1jh","text":"High-Capacity cDNA Revers Transcription Kit: 4368814, Thermo Fisher Scientific","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fgru","text":"SYBR Green master mix: 04707516001, Roche","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"al1fv","text":"Cells were seeded in 10 cm dishes and used for collection when reaching 70-80% confluency. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6k2po","text":"(e.g. 3 million cells for collection after  ) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":1,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"i896","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ar10g","text":"Convert RNA to cDNA using the High-Capacity cDNA Reverse Transcription Kit (4368814, Thermo Fisher Scientific). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"degfs","text":"Scrape and collect cells in PBS(-/-). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bf4c","text":"Spin down cells (450xg,  ). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2chf5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bp722","text":"Wash with PBS(-/-). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7roil","text":"Remove medium. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5oa5k","text":"Wash once with PBS (-/-). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7q15i","text":"Spin down cells (450xg,  ). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"B1B64A7C939511EE951F0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"50fb9","text":"Remove supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7o7q2","text":"Isolate RNA following the instructions of the NucleoSpin RNA Plus kit (740984.50, Macherey-Nagel). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kp9d","text":"! Use a separate, desinfected area to isolate RNA. Use filter tips and dedicated pipets for RNA work. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b6h80","text":"Determine the concentration and the purity of the isolated RNA using a Nanodrop spectrometer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4af1l","text":"Prepare a 2x Mastermix: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35u64","text":"      
  Volume
  (µl)
  Component
  
  2
  µl RT buffer
  
  0,8
  µl dNTPs (100 µM)
  
  2
  µl random primers
  (10x)
  
  1
  µl Multiscribe
  transcriptase (10u/µl)
  
  4,2
  µl AD
  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":189}],"data":{}},{"key":"4s5kr","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4d9il","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7acce","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ul28","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[99,168],"data":[["Volume
  (µl)","Component"],["2","µl RT buffer"],["0,8","µl dNTPs (100 µM)"],["2","µl random primers
  (10x)"],["1","µl Multiscribe
  transcriptase"],["4,2","µl AD"]],"guid":"BA5E73794E0146689EB6171E0D3427C2","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9vsa3","text":"Volumes are given for one sample, multiply according to your number of samples. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Volume
  (µl)","Component"],["2","µl RT buffer"],["0,8","µl dNTPs (100 µM)"],["2","µl random primers
  (10x)"],["1","µl Multiscribe
  transcriptase"],["4,2","µl AD"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"278bg","text":"Prepare 5 µg RNA in 20 µl total volume (dilute with RNase free water). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ci4l6","text":"Add 10 µl of the mastermix to 10 µl of the RNA dilution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ct4v9","text":"Perform a quick vortex and spin down using a table-top centrifuge. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5o016","text":"Start program for RNA to cDNA conversion: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hqna","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3oirv","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bjde","text":"

{"blocks":[{"key":"658p9","text":"Prepare a ten-fold dilution of the cDNA samples in duplicates (5 µl cDNA per well). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"va60","text":"Include a negative control where the cDNA is exchanged by an equivalent volume of water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1b0i","text":"Prepare a master mix containing per sample: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"er5hi","text":"10 µl SYBR Green master mix (Roche)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee0oq","text":"1 µl of 5 µM forward primer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5i0s7","text":"1 µl of 5 µM reverse primer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4mq8","text":"3 µl water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a6hm","text":"Add 15 µl of the master mix to each well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5dopj","text":"Prepare a serial dilution of the sample that you choose as standard (1/5, 1/25, 1/125, 1/625, 1/3125). Include water as a negative control. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lou","text":"Pipet in duplo in a 96-well plate (5 µl per well). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7abfj","text":"Start the qPCR reaction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fblir","text":"95 °C for  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"130q3","text":"50 cycles at 95 °C for   ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8es9n","text":"55 °C for   ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e0h45","text":"95 °C for   ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"42h0p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8s46","text":"Determine a melting curve from 55 to 95 °C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"66aqg","text":"Cover plate with a film and spin samples down. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
